moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 dxc4: Queens Gambit accepted. Ok, so I'm thinking win at this point.
moves.3. e4 b5: Have not played this position in the QGA before.
moves.4... c6: Black is putting up a planned fight !
moves.5. b3: Wrong. Historically speaking, better would have been Nc3, or axb5, or Nf3.
moves.5... cxb3: May have an 'out' with this move. Need to stay aggressive on the Queen side or blacks upcoming free a-pawn will eventually cause me great distress...
moves.6. axb5 Nf6 7. e5: Expecting Nd5 followed by my Qxb3. Not Bxc5, the responding Nxc5 will give black an immediate advantage. I need to move faster than black and delay him as much as possible.
